originalText.text: Dr. Wong was amazing!  My son has flat feet and was complaining about foot pain.  When we arrived, there was no wait.  We had issues with our insurance but Dr. Wong still insisted on seeing us first while we figure out the logistics later.  No tons of ppwk to fill out, just 1 simple form.  Dr. Wong took the time to draw illustrations to show the misalignment and explain the issue.  Excellent bedside manners.  Just an amazing doctor overall!  Glad we found him.

text.text: Dr. Wong was amazing!  My son has flat feet and was complaining about foot pain.  When we arrived, there was no wait.  We had issues with our insurance but Dr. Wong still insisted on seeing us first while we figure out the logistics later.  No tons of ppwk to fill out, just 1 simple form.  Dr. Wong took the time to draw illustrations to show the misalignment and explain the issue.  Excellent bedside manners.  Just an amazing doctor overall!  Glad we found him.

originalText.text: Andrew is absolutely amazing! He came in on his day off to fix my in grown toe nail. Within just 10 minutes of the call he was at the office. He diagnosed the issue and with ease repaired my toe. He instilled a sense of comfort by talking through what he was doing while educating me throughout the process. I highly recommend him for any of your podiatrist needs!

text.text: Andrew is absolutely amazing! He came in on his day off to fix my in grown toe nail. Within just 10 minutes of the call he was at the office. originalText.text:
An excellent doctor. I learned a lot about my flat feet and abnormal foot structure through Dr. Wong's detailed explanations. It is evident that he is extremely passionate about his field.
Most importantly, Dr. Wong is a great communicator and very relatable as not just as a specialist, but as a human being. He gets straight to the point without sounding blunt or arrogant.

Highly recommended if you have any sort of foot problem.

originalText.text: Podiatrist Dr. Andrew K. Wong came highly recommended, and as it turns out, my visits are always excellent. It is always helpful to have a doctor that is knowledgeable about their patient's condition and how best to treat them.  He is professional about assessing my needs and providing treatment for osteoarthritis. He provided a proper diagnosis for the cause of the pain in my feet and prescribed a pair of custom orthotic shoe inserts.   I felt extremely comfortable with him and found him to be pleasant and thorough.  Dr. Wong is a great Podiatrist and Ankle Surgeon and he exceeded my expectations.  I highly recommend his podiatry services to friends and family members. –A. Barrow

originalText.text: Dr. Wong not only diagnoses the problem but he gives really clear explanations and next steps.
